document.full_text: the miami heat beat the chicago bulls 101-93 in overtime on tuesday to take a 3-1 lead in the eastern conference finals and move one win away from a place in the nba finals series.
document.title: heat go 3-1 up with overtime win over bulls
lines_and_colors: the miami heat beat the chicago bulls 101-93 in overtime on tuesday to take a 3-1 lead in the eastern conference finals and move one win away from a place in the nba finals series.
